text: Marek Baster (born 11 June 1976, in Kraków) is a Polish footballer who plays for Czarni Żagań in the Polish Second League (the regionalized third tier). ==Club career== Baster began his football career with Cracovia from 1997, and, though he spent a year away, he found himself back in Kraków at the end of the 1999/2000 season. He started playing for Stal Stalowa Wola in 2001, a third- tier team before switching back to the premier league in 2004. He moved to Arka Gdynia in the II Liga for the 2007–08 season. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:KS Cracovia players Category:Arka Gdynia players Category:Sportspeople from Kraków Category:Association football defenders
title: Marek Baster
